name: Zombie Arena (itch)
description:
An arena-survival shooter with zombies made with/for PICO-8

You can download the game cartridge and run it with PICO-8 if you own it.

Keyboard controls :

  • Arrow keys : Move
  • C : Shoot
Xbox Controller controls (downloadable version only) :
  • Left stick : Move
  • A : Shoot

The game is still in development. Here is what is currently implemented :

  • You get a shotgun with limited ammo (displayed on the upper left corner) at first, allowing you to shoot 3 projectiles at at once. Once you run out of ammo, you'll use your pistol (that only shoots one bullet at a time).
  • You lose 1 HP every time you get hit by a zombie (HPs are displayed on the upper left corner as player head icons).
  • There is only one type of enemy that walks toward the players.
  • Infinite enemy spawn.

What's coming next :

  • More weapons
  • More enemy types
  • Waves system
  • Powerups spawn
  • Score/Timer/Waves survived
  • Grenades/Bombs
  • Enemy corpses
  • Title screen
  • Sounds
